title: North Macedonia Inflation Rate MoM
description: The Consumer Price Index in Macedonia increased 1.40 percent in October of 2022 over the previous month. Inflation Rate MoM in Macedonia averaged 0.23 percent from 1999 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 4.10 percent in April of 2000 and a record low of -2.80 percent in April of 1999. Inflation Rate MoM measures month over month change in the price of goods and services. This page provides the latest reported value for - Macedonia Inflation Rate MoM - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: State Statistical Office of the Republic of Macedonia
